testVerifyTeamInspectionSavedIntoMobileD.description: Test Case 67292:Verify Team Inspection saved into mobile deviceand BO later via outgoing message if there is no connection, Test Case 67299:Verify Inspection displays on the list after DB update and after reconnect Internet, Test Case 67320:Verify user can't send sms if internet connection is lost
